title: Differences in fatty acid composition of rabbit’s meat after the change of the source of fat in the diet

author: Tina Trebušak, Biotechnical Faculty, University of Ljubljana

segmentation: So today I would like to present our research about the effect of different sources of fat.
The diet on fatty acids composition of rabbit Smith.
Nowadays, more and more people are aware of the importance of healthy diet and pollen saturated fatty acids, especially omega-3, are known for their beneficial effect on human health.
But western diet.
Have a low intake of Omega trim and the relatively higher consumption of Omega 6 pollen, saturated fatty acids and that lead to very high ratio of Omega 6 to omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids.
Recent recommendation for human diets suggest.
Increasing.
Omega-3 consumption and increasing the ratio of Omega 6 to Omega trim to five to one or even lower.
Deficiency of Omega 3 point saturated fatty acids increases the risk of developing queries, diseases, especially cardiovascular diseases.
Meat and meat products are.
Very important in human nutrition because their source of.
Quality proteins, essential amino acids, vitamins, minerals as well as fats.
Therefore, meat has always been very important for healthy growth and development.
But this reputation has recently decreased because of the opinion that it contains a lot of facts with unfavorable composition.
But feds are absolutely necessary in our diet because there are impacts on nutritional, energy and sensory value of food.
And Moreover they improve taste and flavor of food.
And they are especially important as the source of fat soluble vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids.
Because of the aforementioned deficiency of omega-3 pollen, saturated fatty acids in human diet, the interest in obtaining animal products.
With high levels of omega-3 has increased.
The fact that its composition can be improved by different dietary strategies.
And because of its high alkaline will any case it's content, lens it or linseed oil is suitable and frequently used plant source of Omega, triple unsaturated fatty acids?
Rabbit meat is often recommended by nutritionists because as you can see in the table, it has love lipid and cholesterol level and high content of polyunsaturated fatty acids.
Rabbit meat also has better fatty acid composition compared to other meats.
So they.
Of our research was to determine the changes of fatty acids composition of rabbit meat if palm fat as the source of fat in the diet was replaced with linseed oil.
In our experiment, we used 24 seeker rabbits which were randomly divided into two groups.
The control groups and the Lindsey Group.
The control group received standard rabbit diets with six percent of punk fan palm fat and on the other side, linseed group received Rapidride with six percent of linseed oil.
As expected, the Fed this is composition of the dietze different according to the ingredients.
So we can see here we can see that linseed diet had higher proportion of Omega Trip and total polyunsaturated fatty acids and lower proportion of saturated fatty acids.
The diet also has better ratio between Omega 6 and Omega trim, pulling saturated fatty acids.
So during the experiment with Daily Record, the diet intake and weekly recorded body weights of animals.
And after 22 days of treatment, anymore animals were slaughtered and the samples of back and hind leg muscle were taken.
The fact is, it's composition of samples worse analyzed using a gas chromatographic method and Malone Delta heat concentration was determined with high performance liquid chromatography.
Here are our results.
They went at the end of the experiment.
The weight gain did not differ between groups, and the same results were obtained in feeding taken fit conversion rate.
So that means that.
Diet did not affect the productive performance of animals.

If you looked over all fatty acids composition, we can see that linseed oil inclusion costs a higher proportion of polling saturated fatty acids due to reduction of saturated fatty acids and linseed oil addition significantly increased proportion of most of the Omega, triple, and saturated fatty acids, and on the other side by side cost.
Lower proportion of Omega 6 pole and saturated fatty acids.
This led to.
Low ratio of Omega 6 to Omega Trip, which was in back.
Russell 7.28 to one in control group and 1.81 in linseed group and in.
Hind leg muscle 6.82.
Two one in control group and 1.21 to 18.
Linseed group.
Them alone, Delta heat concentration was also influenced by diet.
Here linseed oil inclusion cost significantly higher concentration of laundered hit in both muscles.
Self.
And we can conclude that fatty acids composition of rabbit meat reflected the fatty acids composition of rabbit diet.
In our experimental Insight oil addition coastal over content of total saturated fatty acids and higher content of Omega Triple X rated fatty acids.
And the higher content of omega-3 pollen saturated fatty acids.
And Lindsey diet leads to a low ratio for Mega 6 to Mega triple in saturated fatty acids and by decreasing this ratio we can provide healthier food for human.

But however, the higher content of pollen citrated fatty acids lead to higher susceptibility of two lipid oxidation, and such enrichment might reduce the shelf life of meat products, and it can also negatively affect animals in their health.
So therefore further research is needed to protect animals and their health.
And their products from Lipit oxidation by adding various natural antioxidant to their diets.
Thing.
You for your attention.
